Name: LastShot
About the game: Last Shot - A fast platformer shooter where you can pick up bonuses for speed or jumping, smash boxes with weapons, blow up enemies with your own bombs, many beautiful levels and the final boss, which will leave you no chance and make players nervous and build tactics against the last test . Game Features: - Hardcore gameplay - Pixel-Art - the Boss
